item.name: Generate a secure presigned upload URL for profile pictures

request.description: Returns a temporary upload URL that expires in 5 minutes. File size limit: 5MB.

item.name: Generate a secure presigned upload URL for bibliography files (PDF/Video/PowerPoint)

request.description: Returns a temporary upload URL that expires in 10 minutes. File size limit: 100MB. Supports PDF, video files (MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, WebM), and PowerPoint files (PPT, PPTX).

item.name: Generate a secure presigned upload URL for thumbnail images

request.description: Returns a temporary upload URL that expires in 5 minutes. File size limit: 5MB.
Verify that an uploaded file exists and is valid

item.name: Upload file via PUT with raw binary body

request.description: Send raw file buffer (e.g., PDF, MP4, PPT, PPTX) in the request body with the appropriate Content-Type header. Must use Postman, curl, or frontend — Swagger UI doesn't support raw binary upload.

item.name: Upload file via PUT with raw binary body

request.description: Send raw file buffer (e.g., PDF, MP4, JPEG) in the request body with the appropriate Content-Type header. Must use Postman, curl, or frontend — Swagger UI doesn't support raw binary upload.

item.name: Upload thumbnail via PUT with raw binary body

request.description: Send raw image buffer (JPEG, PNG, WebP) in the request body with the appropriate Content-Type header. Must use Postman, curl, or frontend — Swagger UI doesn't support raw binary upload.
